"""salary = df[“Salary Estimate”].str.split(“-”, expand=True)

salary[0] = salary[0].str.replace(“$”, “”)

salary[0] = salary[0].str.replace(“K”, “”).astype(“float”)

salary[1] = salary[1].str.split(” “)[0][0]

salary[1] = salary[1].str.replace(“K” ,“”)

salary[1] = salary[1].str.replace(“$” ,“”)

salary[1] = salary[1].astype(“float”)

salary[3] = (salary[0] + salary[1]) / 2

df = pd.concat([df,salary],axis=1)          #farklı yaklaşım lar olabilir."""
